Q.1) What is the importance of studying the BSG organ journals i.e., Value Creation/Value Creation Times (VC/VCT) and Future Division Times (FDT) in strengthening one’s faith and to be in rhythm for achieving victory for kosen-rufu?
Q.2) How can we encourage members to subscribe to VC/VCT & FDT
Q.3) How can we make the study of VC/VCT & FDT a regular aspect of our daily practice as well as for our kosen-rufu activities?
Q.4) What is the importance of having subscription targets and how can we successfully achieve them?
Q.5) How do we foster and train UHG Coordinators at all levels?
Q.6) How does striving as a UHG Coordinator without giving up bring benefits and victories in our lives?
Q.7) We find that few practicing leaders from the same family subscribe to only one VC/ FDT. How do we encourage these leaders to subscribe to their individual copies? our lives?
